page.title: 17CARAVAN SITES IN SELSEY
page.content: Selsey is well known for its clean air.It is a very healthy place.Selsey enjoys a lot of sunshine hours compared with other resorts on the South Coast.Mr.Bunn the Assistant Managing Director of West Sands,Green Lawns and White Horse Caravan Sites told us that his father started here in 1961.West Sands is not open all the year round,only from March 1st. until October 31st.It is mostly busy in the School holidays.West Sands has many facilities which include 2 pools,2 ballrooms,1 public bar, 2 restaurants,a fairground,Sunday Market and a hairdressers.He advertises in the Sunday newspapers.You can send off for a coloured brochure which will give you all the information you need.
